Package prkmodel.types

Interface NeuronState

public interface NeuronState
Interface representing the state of a neuron in the nervous system. It defines the properties and behaviors related to the state of a neuron.
Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Method Details

    • getType

      NeuronStateDescription getType()
      Retrieves the current state description of the neuron.
      Returns:
      the NeuronStateDescription of the neuron.

    • getDopamineLevel

      double getDopamineLevel()
      Retrieves the current dopamine level of the neuron.
      Returns:
      the dopamine level as a double.

    • getMyelinLevel

      int getMyelinLevel()
      Retrieves the current myelin level of the neuron.
      Returns:
      the myelin level as an integer.

    • setType

      void setType(NeuronStateDescription type)
      Sets the state description of the neuron.
      Parameters:
      type - the new NeuronStateDescription of the neuron.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the type is null.

    • updateDopamine

      void updateDopamine(double t)
      Updates the dopamine level of the neuron by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      t - the amount to update the dopamine level by.

    • updateMyelin

      void updateMyelin(int t)
      Updates the myelin level of the neuron by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      t - the amount to update the myelin level by.

    • increaseDopamineProduction

      void increaseDopamineProduction()
      Increases the dopamine production of the neuron.
